EDU_BOT: Functions to EDU_BOT by elecfreaks Co.,Ltd.
EDU_BOT.MotorsList: Select the motor on the left or right
EDU_BOT.RGBLights: Select the RGBLights on the left or right
EDU_BOT.ServoList: Select the servo on the S1 or S2
EDU_BOT.backforward: TODO: full speed move back,speed is -100.
EDU_BOT.forward: TODO: full speed move forward,speed is 100.
EDU_BOT.motors: TODO: Set the speed of left and right wheels.
EDU_BOT.moveTime: TODO: Full speed operation lasts for 10 seconds,speed is 100.
EDU_BOT.setServo: TODO: Set the angle of servo.
EDU_BOT.singleheadlights: TODO: Select a headlights and set the RGB color.
EDU_BOT.trackEvent: TODO: Runs when line sensor finds or loses.
EDU_BOT.tracking: Judging the Current Status of Tracking Module.
EDU_BOT.tracking|param|state: Four states of tracking module, eg: TrackingState.L_R_line
EDU_BOT.ultrasonic: Cars can extend the ultrasonic function to prevent collisions and other functions..
